name: Microsoft Excel HTML Spreadsheet
summary: An XLSHTML file is an HTML version of a spreadsheet created with Microsoft Excel, a spreadsheet productivity application. It contains the HTML representation of the source .XLS spreadsheet file, and is typically published online to be viewed in a web browser.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Excel

macos.display_name: No longer supported by Microsoft Excel
